titles.title: Strategic Petroleum Demand Response Act of 2011

A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Confirmation Act to require the Secretary of Energy to develop and implement a strategic petroleum demand response plan to reduce the consumption of petroleum products by the Federal Government.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1833)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles
